title: G-Tech Apparel Turns Heat Up on Cold-Weather Rounds - Sports Illustrated
content: G-Tech Apparel Turns Heat Up on Cold-Weather Rounds  Sports Illustrated
description: As winter continues, staying warm on the course becomes paramount, which is why every avid golfer should trust in G-Tech's heated pouches. Donâ€™t believe us? Just ask players from both sides of the recent Ryder Cup.
